name: Mr Rabbit's Jigsaw Puzzle
description:
Welcome to Mr. Rabbit’s Jigsaw Puzzle!
Mr. Rabbit has been very active recently releasing game after game and the newest addition to your collection of games for toddlers is this colourful puzzle game.
What can you expect from the game? Well it’s a puzzle game so it’s pretty straightforward. You start the application and you’re being presented with a wonderful photo of an animal which is being scrambled into puzzle. Every time you start to solve it it’s different as the puzzle are generated randomly. There are also different levels of difficulty so you can adjust it to your kid’s age and device size.
There also is a built in watch which measures the time from start to completion and the number of moves used to solve the puzzle.
Why solve puzzle? Puzzle are wonderful exercise for children as they improve attention focus and solving problems, finding matching elements and improving memory. All great things for your child’s development.
Mr. Rabbit’s Puzzle:
◆ Have over 20 beautiful photos of animals to use as basis for your puzzle.
◆ Adjustable difficulty level from simple basic puzzle to very hard and small pieces.
◆ Are completely random and allow solving same photos many times as the puzzle change every time.
